channel.title: Posts on LED makerspace
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on LED makerspace

item.title: Glow IDE
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Microsoft’s free cross-platform open-source Visual Studio Code editor together with the free open-source Glow IDE extension provides an all-in-one editor, compiler, and simulator to create and view animations.

item.title: Glowscript
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Glowscript is a simple yet powerful asynchronous multithreaded procedural programming language for creating multilayered (superimposed) animations on smart LED strips, such as DotStars and NeoPixels.

item.title: Glow OS
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Glow operating system, written in C, is optimized for embedded devices driving smart LED strips.

item.title: Hardware
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Run animations on your own smart LED device using the Elektra LED development board powered by an ARM Cortex microcontroller.
